name: PurpleMaster (NSFW, The earliest build of M.O.D.)
name_original: PurpleMaster (NSFW, The earliest build of M.O.D.)
description:
Hello! this is a very early build of this visual novel: https://weird420xl.itch.io/master-of-dragons-browser-version

Originally, this visual novel was entirely purple, featured a different thumbnail pic to represent it (the pride pic with the characters) and was going to have a secret Easter Egg where Ekips says "Happy Wednesday."

It's fun thinking about what the project looked like at such an early stage in development.
